description: System-generated unique identifier for the pay type record; used as the table’s primary key.
Business code for the pay type (e.g., regular, overtime) used in payroll calculations and reporting.
Human-readable name or description of the pay type shown in UIs and reports.
Numeric factor applied to the base hourly rate to compute pay for this type (e.g., 1.0, 1.5).
Flag indicating this is the default pay type for standard hours (1=yes, 0=no).
Free-text notes or additional details about the pay type.
System audit timestamp when this pay type record was last updated.
Timestamp of the most recent user-driven update; name suggests a user identifier—confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created the record; likely stores a user ID—confirm with SME.
Timestamp when the record was created by a user; may duplicate system creation time—confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who last modified the record; likely a user ID—confirm with SME.
Timestamp when the record was last modified by a user; may duplicate last_modified—confirm with SME.
